import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-cart', templateUrl: './cart.component.html', styleUrls: ['./cart.component.css'] }) export class CartComponent { constructor(){} selectedMedicines: any[] = []; ngOnInit(): void { const cart = localStorage.getItem('cart') if(cart!==null){ this.selectedMedicines = JSON.parse(cart) } console.log(this.selectedMedicines) } }
